card_name: Farfa, Malebranche of the Burning Abyss
card_text: If you control a monster that is not a "Burning Abyss" monster, destroy this card. You can only use 1 of these effects of "Farfa, Malebranche of the Burning Abyss" per turn, and only once that turn.$N●If you control no Spells/Traps: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.$N●If this card is sent to the GY: You can target 1 monster on the field; banish it until the End Phase.
